name: Air Dream College
about: Air Dream College, established in 2020, is a premier aviation school located in Lisbon and Évora, Portugal. Founded by three friends who identified a lack in aviation instruction, the college offers a unique modular ATPL course, tailored to each student's needs. With state-of-the-art facilities, including new classrooms and a fleet of six Tecnam aircraft, Air Dream College provides an excellent learning environment. The school boasts a brand-new fleet, including the Tecnam P2006T NG, and operates in areas with favorable meteorological conditions, allowing students to fly up to 95% of the year. Committed to innovation, quality, and excellence, Air Dream College is dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation dreams with a personalized and professional approach.
